description: This is a short hike to some nice falls.  It's a nice secondary stop on your way hiking to Burntcoat Head.  From the road, head to the river through a mixed forest.  there are three sets of falls.  the two major ones are located at the site of the old mill, while a smaller one is located upstream of the mill.
directions: Drive to Noel.  Turn on Lake Rd and park approx at N45.28675 W63.73624
title: Noel River Fall
